en.name: One-to-one training
en.coverDescription: Helping your employees do their jobs better is sometimes difficult, especially when you have a lot to ask and little time to give. However, it is critical for managers and team leaders to have the skills to teach people in their care. To ensure training is effective, a few principles should be applied. This course aims to introduce useful techniques of one-to-one training: training people with context, going slowly and giving them time to practise.

fr.name: L’importance de la formation individuelle
fr.coverDescription: Il est parfois difficile d'aider vos employés à mieux faire leur travail, surtout lorsque vous en demandez beaucoup mais n'offrez que peu de temps pour le faire. Cependant, il est essentiel que les managers et les chefs d’équipe aient les compétences nécessaires pour former leurs employés. Pour s'assurer que cette formation soit efficace, quelques principes doivent être appliqués. Ce cours vise à introduire des techniques utiles de formation individuelle : former des personnes grâce à la contextualisation, avancer en douceur et leur donner le temps de s'exercer.

de.name: Die Bedeutung des individuellen Trainings
de.coverDescription:
DEMNÄCHST BALD AUF DEUTSCH
Helping your employees do their jobs better is sometimes difficult, especially when you have a lot to ask and little time to give. However, it is critical for managers and team leaders to have the skills to teach people in their care. To ensure training is effective, a few principles should be applied. This course aims to introduce useful techniques of one-to-one training: training people with context, going slowly and giving them time to practise.
